entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NW 25 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
